Sentencas: An understanding of the high-temperature processes, such as sintering, remains a challenge despite its paramount importance, and has yet to be achieved by the scientific community.
Titulo: Investigation of the inner microstructure of composite materials during their densification by scanning electron microscopy - LSM:YSZ electrode case study

Sentencas: Scanning electron microscopy is a valuable technique for investigating morphological changes, including elemental composition, by means of an energy-dispersive X-ray detector associated with these processes, with high resolution in-situ.
Titulo: Investigation of the inner microstructure of composite materials during their densification by scanning electron microscopy - LSM:YSZ electrode case study

Sentencas: Historically, this technique has been limited to experiments conducted at ambient temperature.
Titulo: Investigation of the inner microstructure of composite materials during their densification by scanning electron microscopy - LSM:YSZ electrode case study

Sentencas: However, by integrating scanning electron microscopy with a MEMS (R) heating chip, this limitation can be overcome, enabling the study of solidstate processes at temperatures of up to 1 200 C. This study demonstrates one potential application of in-situ scanning electron microscopy - the densification of La1-xSrxMnO3-delta : (ZrO2:Y2O3) composite.
Titulo: Investigation of the inner microstructure of composite materials during their densification by scanning electron microscopy - LSM:YSZ electrode case study

Sentencas: This material, employed as an oxygen electrode in solid oxide cells, exhibits a complex microstructure.
Titulo: Investigation of the inner microstructure of composite materials during their densification by scanning electron microscopy - LSM:YSZ electrode case study

Sentencas: Achieving a balance between effective particle interconnection, ensuring high electric conductivity, and efficient mass transport through its porous structure is crucial.
Titulo: Investigation of the inner microstructure of composite materials during their densification by scanning electron microscopy - LSM:YSZ electrode case study

Sentencas: A comprehensive understanding of microstructure and surface composition evolution during the sintering process is vital to addressing trade off when optimizing densification conditions.
Titulo: Investigation of the inner microstructure of composite materials during their densification by scanning electron microscopy - LSM:YSZ electrode case study

Sentencas: It was shown that the densification of La1-xSrxMnO3-delta : (ZrO2:Y2O3) composite occurs in two steps.
Titulo: Investigation of the inner microstructure of composite materials during their densification by scanning electron microscopy - LSM:YSZ electrode case study

Sentencas: At 900 C a significant additional porosity emerged due to the La1-xSrxMnO3-delta phase shrinkage (densification).
Titulo: Investigation of the inner microstructure of composite materials during their densification by scanning electron microscopy - LSM:YSZ electrode case study

Sentencas: The main densification process at 1 150 C then acts as a self-healing mechanism, leading to the formation of a wellinterconnected microstructure.
Titulo: Investigation of the inner microstructure of composite materials during their densification by scanning electron microscopy - LSM:YSZ electrode case study

Sentencas: Interparticle ligament formation is exclusively induced by the La1-xSrxMnO3-delta phase.
Titulo: Investigation of the inner microstructure of composite materials during their densification by scanning electron microscopy - LSM:YSZ electrode case study

Sentencas: Notably, no common degradation processes, such as La2Zr2O7 formation, were observed under the experimental conditions employed.
Titulo: Investigation of the inner microstructure of composite materials during their densification by scanning electron microscopy - LSM:YSZ electrode case study

Sentencas: This study underscores the promise of scanning electron microscopy with a heating chip extension for in-situ investigations pertinent to various high-temperature technologies.
Titulo: Investigation of the inner microstructure of composite materials during their densification by scanning electron microscopy - LSM:YSZ electrode case study
